directions: In a large salad bowl, lightly stir together the pineapple, cantaloupe, peaches, plums, bananas, oranges, kiwi fruit, apricots, cherries, grapes, and strawberries; chill for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and chopped
2 oranges, peeled and cut into bite size pieces
title: Summer Fruit Salad
